snippet: Pope Francis on Monday wished Jews worldwide a “sweet and peaceful” Rosh Hashana, which is the Jewish New Year, citing “important decisions lying ahead.”
abstract: Pope Francis wishes Jews worldwide a 'sweet and peaceful' Rosh Hashana, which is the Jewish New Year.
lead_paragraph: Pope Francis on Monday wished Jews worldwide a “sweet and peaceful” Rosh Hashana, which is the Jewish New Year, citing “important decisions lying ahead.”

headline.main: The Vatican: Pope Sends New Year’s Greetings to Jews
headline.print_headline: The Vatican: Pope Sends New Year’s Greetings to Jews
